items.sentence: I wouldn\'t be too surprised if this song became a hit.
I had trouble understanding what Tom was trying to say.
Tom was sitting at the bar three stools away from Mary.
I felt uncomfortable and wanted to leave, but I stayed.
If Tom finds out I told you this, he\'ll be very angry.
I went to the refrigerator and got myself another beer.
I wish I could figure out how to install this software.
I wish school had been like this when I was growing up.
If Tom is looking for someone to blame, it\'ll be Mary.
If there\'s anything I can do to help, please just ask.
